unit.name: Harbinger of Father Chaos
unit.description: single model, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x25 mm, Fearless, Light Troops, Supernal

unit.name: Kuulimas Deceiver
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x25 mm, Dominion of Envy, Fear, Fearless, Light Troops, Protean Magic, Supernal, Wizard Apprentice, Know Thyself, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Maw of Akaan
unit.description: single model, 0-1 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 150x100 mm, Dominion of Gluttony, Fearless, Supernal, Wizard Apprentice, Aegis (5+, against Magical Attacks), Devour, Fortitude (5+)

unit.name: Miser of Sugulag
unit.description: single model, 0-1 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Dominion of Greed, Fearless, Supernal, Wizard Apprentice, Half Off, Abyssal Armour

unit.name: Courtesan of Cibaresh
unit.description: single model, 0-1 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Avert your Gaze, Dominion of Lust, Fearless, Supernal, Wizard Apprentice, Distracting, Hard Target (1), Razor Tentacles

unit.name: Omen of Savar
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 50x50 mm, Divine Right, Dominion of Pride, Fear, Fearless, Supernal, Wizard Apprentice, Aegis (4+, against Magical Attacks)

unit.name: Sentinel of Nukuja
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Dominion of Sloth, Fear, Fearless, Omniscience, Supernal, Third Eye, Wizard Master, Crush Attack

unit.name: Vanadras Scourge
unit.description: single model, 0-1 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Dominion of Wrath, Fearless, Fly (7", 14"), Light Troops, Supernal, Aegis (4+, against Melee Attacks), Battle Focus, Devastating Charge (Distracting), Rage

unit.name: Imps
unit.description: 10-25 models, 0-40 Models/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x25 mm, Fearless, Scoring, Supernal, Aegis (3+, against Shooting Attacks), Energy Bolts (4+)

equipment.name: Mark of the Eternal Champion (Champion only)

unit.name: Succubi
unit.description: 10-25 models, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x25 mm, Fearless, Scoring, Supernal, Talon Scythes

unit.name: Lemures
unit.description: 10-25 models, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x25 mm, Fearless, Scoring, Supernal, Parry

unit.name: Myrmidons
unit.description: 10-30 models, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x25 mm, Fearless, Scoring, Supernal, Devastating Charge (Battle Focus), Fight in Extra Rank

unit.name: Eidolons
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-18 Models/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x25 mm, Fearless, Light Troops, Skirmisher, Supernal, Wizard Conclave, Hard Target (1), Dark Fire (3+)

unit.name: Hellhounds
unit.description: 5-15 models, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x50 mm, Fearless, Hellish Growl, Supernal, Lethal Strike

unit.name: Threshing Engine
unit.description: single model, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Fearless, Supernal, Swiftstride, Hard Target (1), Draft Beast (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (2D3), Inanimate

unit.name: Titanslayer Chariot
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Fearless, Mountain Breaker, Supernal, Swiftstride, Myrmidon (2): Devastating Charge (Battle Focus), Chthonic Machinator: Harnessed, Chassis, Impact Hits (D3+1), Inanimate

unit.name: Mageblight Gremlins
unit.description: 2-4 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 40x40 mm, Fearless, Light Troops, Skirmisher, Supernal, Veil Stalker, Hard Target (1), Poison Attacks, Spell Craving

unit.name: Clawed Fiends
unit.description: 3-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 40x40 mm, Fearless, Scoring, Supernal, Smother

unit.name: Hoarders
unit.description: 3-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 40x40 mm, Fear, Fearless, Scoring, Strider, Supernal, Tightening Grasp

unit.name: Sirens
unit.description: 5-15 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm,

unit.name: Blazing Glory
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 50x50 mm, Falling Star, Fear, Fearless, Supernal, Towering Presence

unit.name: Hope Harvester
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Fear, Fearless, Not a Leader, Supernal, War Platform, Aether Battery (3+)

unit.name: Brazen Beasts
unit.description: 3-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x75 mm, Fear, Fearless, Scoring, Supernal, Daredevil: Battle Focus, Devastating Charge (+2 Att,+2 Str, +2 AP), Beast: Battle Focus, Harnessed, Impact Hits (2)

unit.name: Furies
unit.description: 5-15 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x25 mm, Fearless, Fly (10", 20"), Light Troops, Skirmisher, Supernal, Hard Target (1), Devastating Charge (+1 Str)

unit.name: Veil Serpents
unit.description: 3-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 40x40 mm, Fearless, Fly (9", 12"), Light Troops, Morphlings, Supernal, Wizard Conclave

unit.name: Bloat Flies
unit.description: 3-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 50x75 mm, Fear, Fearless, Fly (6", 14"), Light Troops, Supernal, Aegis (5+, against Magical Attacks), Fortitude (5+), Acid Blood

mount.name: Dark Pulpit
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Tall, Cannot be Stomped, Harnessed

mount.name: Pale Horse
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Elusive, Feigned Flight, Strider, Vanguard, Hard Target (1), Harnessed

mount.name: Burning Wheel
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Construct, Base 50x50 mm, Fly (10", 10"), Swiftstride, Tall, Vanguard, Hard Target (1), Harnessed

mount.name: Great Beast of Prophecy
mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x75 mm, Fear, Harnessed

mount.name: Great Beast of Prophecy (Fly)
mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x75 mm, Fear, Harnessed

mount.name: Throne of Overwhelming Splendour
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Fly (9", 9"), Light Troops, Rising Star, Swiftstride, Towering Presence, Harnessed, Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate

item.name: Abyssal Armour
item.description: Armour Equipment. Follows the rules for Plate Armour. For each Veil Token in the owners Veil Token pool, attacks against the wearer suffer -1 Armour Penetration, up to a maximum of -3.

item.name: Acid Blood
item.description: Special Attack. For each Fortitude Save the model fails against Melee Attacks, the model that caused the wounding hit immediately suffers 1 hit with Toxic Attacks, before any casualties are removed, distributed onto the models Health Pool.

item.name: Aether Battery
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Volley Gun. Range 18", Shots 2D6x2, Str 4, AP 1. Before rolling for the number of shots, the owner may choose to discard 1-3 Veil Tokens from their Veil Token pool. If so, the number of shots is increased by +3 per discarded Veil Token.

item.name: Aura of Despair
item.description: Dominant. Enemy units suffer −2" Advance Rate to a minimum of 1" when rolling for Charge Range against units with at least one model with this Manifestation in the Charge Phase.

item.name: Avert your Gaze
item.description: Universal Rule. Enemy units within 6" of one or more models with Avert Your Gaze suffer -2 Discipline when taking Combat Reform tests.

item.name: Brimstone Secretions
item.description: Attacks that are Divine Attacks made against the model lose this Attack Attribute.

item.name: Bronze Backbone
item.description: The model gains Hatred.

item.name: Broodmother
item.description: Dominant. At the end of each Round of Combat during which the models unit was Engaged in Combat, and during which the model caused at least three Health Point losses against enemy units with Close Combat Attacks, the unit Raises D3 Health Points.

item.name: Centipede Legs
item.description: The model gains +1" Advance Rate.

item.name: Charged Tendrils
item.description: At the end of Siphon the Veil, the owner is allowed to store up to 6 Veil Tokens instead of the normal 3.

item.name: Chilling Yawn
item.description: Dominant. Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with this Manifestation suffer −2 Agility.

item.name: Chitinous Scales
item.description: The model gains +2 Armour, to a maximum of 3.

item.name: Cloven Hooves
item.description: Unless the model already has Impact Hits (X), it gains Impact Hits (D3+1). These Impact Hits are resolved with Strength 5 and Armour Penetration 2.

item.name: Colossal Stature
item.description: Universal Rule. The model counts as Gigantic for the purpose of determining the number of Full Ranks.

item.name: Dark Fire
Dark Fire (3+)
Dark Fire (2+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon, Range 18", Shots 2, Str 4, AP 0. Armour Save rolls of 1, 2, 3, and 4 are always considered failed when saving wounds caused by Dark Fire.

item.name: Dark Hide
item.description: The model gains Scout with the following exception: it must be deployed fully inside the owners Deployment Zone, and the owner must have deployed at least one unit normally.

item.name: Devour
item.description: Personal Protection. For each Health Point loss the model causes with Close Combat Attacks against enemy units, roll a D6 at the end of the Initiative Step. For each rolled 4+, the model gains +1 Health Point. When the model has 18 Health Points, all units within 9" immediately suffer 2D6 hits with Toxic Attacks, and the model is removed as a casualty.

item.name: Dextrous Tentacles
item.description: The model gains +1 Agility.

item.name: Digestive Vomit
item.description: One use only. Must be activated the first time the models unit performs a Post-Combat Pivot or a Post-Combat Reform. The model gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration until the end of the game.

item.name: Divine Right
item.description: Universal Rule. The model cannot join units with other Characters and other Characters cannot join its unit. The model must issue a Duel whenever possible (this cannot be prevented by issuing a Duel with another friendly model first). This duel must (if possible) be accepted by a Character unless a Champion accepts first. In addition, when fighting a Duel, the model gains Lethal Strike and Multiple Wounds (2).

item.name: Divining Snout
item.description: When Charging a unit that contains one or more Special Items, the model gains +2" Advance Rate for Charge Range rolls. The effects only apply in the Charge Phase and only if all models in the unit are affected by Divining Snout.

item.name: Dominion of Envy
item.description: Universal Rule. The models Close Combat Attacks allocated towards models equipped with Close Combat Weapons other than Hand Weapons (regardless if they are using them or not) gain +2 Offensive Skill.

item.name: Dominion of Gluttony
item.description: Universal Rule. The model must reroll natural to-wound rolls of 1 with its Melee Attacks.

item.name: Dominion of Greed
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains +2 Defensive Skill while its unit is in base contact with an enemy Scoring Unit.

item.name: Dominion of Lust
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Strider. When rolling their Charge Range in the Charge Phase, units consisting entirely of models with Dominion of Lust must reroll failed Charge Range rolls if they are Located in the Charged units Flank or Rear Facing.

item.name: Dominion of Pride
item.description: Universal Rule. Units with more than half of their models with this rule may reroll failed Discipline Tests.

item.name: Dominion of Sloth
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Aegis (+1, against Special Attacks).

item.name: Dominion of Wrath
item.description: Universal Rule. The models attacks ignore Parry.

item.name: Elusive
item.description: Universal Rule. Units composed entirely of models with Elusive may declare a Flee Charge Reaction despite being Fearless.

item.name: Energy Bolts
Energy Bolts (4+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 24", Shots 1, Str 5, AP 0, Reload!, Volley Fire.

item.name: Engine of Damnation
item.description: Universal Rule. The models base size is changed to 150x100 mm and its Height is changed to Gigantic. Its Health Points are set to 7, Resilience is set to 6, March Rate is set to 15", and it loses War Platform.

item.name: Falling Star
item.description: Universal Rule. The models Offensive Skill and Defensive Skill are set to twice the models current number of Health Points. The model counts as a Character for the purpose of Duels. When the model fights a Duel during a Round of Combat, it gains Stubborn until the end of the Round of Combat.

item.name: Firestarter
Firestarter (Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell))
Firestarter (Hand of Heaven (Thaumaturgy))
item.description: Universal Rule. The Standard Bearer can cast the spell stated in brackets as a Bound Spell with Power Level (5/8).

item.name: Grasping Proboscis
item.description: At the end of each Round of Combat during which the models unit was Engaged in Combat, and the model caused at least three Health Point losses against enemy units with Melee Attacks, the owner gains D3 Veil Tokens to their Veil Token pool.

item.name: Greater Dominion
item.description: At the start of each friendly Player Turn, you may choose one friendly unit within the Commanding Presence range of the model with Greater Dominion. All R&F models in the chosen unit gain the Dominion rule in the Characters unit entry until the end of the next Player Turn.

item.name: Greenfire Eyes
item.description: One use only. Must be activated when the models unit fails its first Charge Range roll. The unit must reroll the Charge Range roll.

item.name: Half Off
item.description: Personal Protection. If the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds (X), reduce X by half, rounding fractions up.

item.name: Hammer Hand
item.description: The model gains +1 Attack Value.

item.name: Hellish Growl
item.description: Universal Rule. At the start of each Round of Combat, enemy units in base contact with one or more models with Hellish Growl must take a Discipline Test with a -1 modifier. Failed to-wound rolls from attacks made by the model against units that fail this test must be rerolled. The effect lasts until the end of the Round of Combat.

item.name: Horde Thresher
item.description: Universal Rule. Changes to the models profile: - Its base size is changed to 100x100 mm. - Its Health Points are set to 6. - It gains 1 additional Tiller. - It gains 1 additional Draft Beast. - It gains Colossal Stature. - The Chassis gains Impact Hits (3D3).

item.name: Horns of Hubris
item.description: The model gains Vanguard (6").

item.name: Hot Blood
item.description: The model gains Devastating Charge (+2 Agi).

item.name: Immortal Denizens
item.description: Casting rolls made by models in a Daemon Legions army with one or two dice gain a +1 Casting Modifier. For casting rolls with a single Magic Dice, a natural roll of 1 or 2 is always a failed Casting Attempt, regardless of any modifiers. In addition, in a game involving at least one Daemon Legions Army, each player adds +2 Veil Tokens to their Veil Token pool in the Magic Phase during Siphon the Veil when they are the Active Player.

item.name: Incendiary Ichor
item.description: The model gains Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks). All Melee Attacks (including Special Attacks) and Shooting Attacks made by the model with Incendiary Ichor become Flaming Attacks. The model automatically fails all Fortitude Saves.

item.name: Iron Husk
item.description: The models Resilience is set to 6.

item.name: Kaleidoscopic Flesh
item.description: The model gains Hard Target (1).

item.name: Know Thyself
item.description: Universal Rule. At the start of the Initiative Step in which the bearers Close Combat Attacks will be performed, choose one model part from each enemy model in base contact and add their Attack Value Characteristics, excluding any modifiers, to the Attack Value of Kuulimas Deceiver. At the end of each Round of Combat, the bearers Attack Value is set to 1.

item.name: Legion Thresher
item.description: Universal Rule. Changes to the models profile: - Its base size is changed to 100x150 mm. - Its Health Points are set to 8. - It gains 2 additional Tillers. - It gains 2 additional Draft Beasts. - It gains Colossal Stature. - The Chassis gains Impact Hits (4D3).

item.name: Living Shield
item.description: The model gains Parry.

item.name: Mark of the Eternal Champion
Mark of the Eternal Champion (Champion only)
item.description: If the bearer is not a Wizard, it becomes a Wizard Apprentice that does not select spells as normal but always knows Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell). If the bearer is already a Wizard, it knows Spear of Infinity in addition to its other spells and cannot select it during Spell Selection.

item.name: Mesmerising Plumage
item.description: Dominant. Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with this Manifestation suffer −1 Offensive Skill and −1 Defensive Skill.

item.name: Mirrored Scales
item.description: Each Close Combat Attack allocated towards the model for which a natural 1 is rolled to hit is distributed onto the attacking models Health Pool.

item.name: Morphlings
item.description: Universal Rule. During Spell Selection, each unit of Veil Serpents must choose a Manifestation from the list below and apply the effects during the game. - Writhing Nightmares - Mesmerising Plumage - Chilling Yawn

item.name: Mountain Breaker
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains +2" Advance Rate when rolling for Charge Range against units that consist entirely of models with Towering Presence in the Charge Phase. In addition, the models Impact Hits gain Multiple Wounds (D3, against Towering Presence).

item.name: Omniscience
item.description: Universal Rule. In the owners Magic Phase, if the model did not March Move or declare a Charge this Player Turn, the cost of converting Veil Tokens into Magic Dice is decreased to 2:1 during this Player Turn (1 Magic Dice per 2 Veil Tokens).

item.name: Piercing Spike
item.description: Close Combat Attacks made by the model gain +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Rage
item.description: Universal Rule. Whenever the model loses a Health Point, it gains +1 Attack Value. Whenever it gains a Health Point, it suffers -1 Attack Value.

item.name: Razor Tentacles
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. If the attack is allocated towards an enemy R&F model while the attacker is Engaged with the Flank or Rear Facing of the targets unit, the attack gains Area Attack (1x5), and its Strength and Armour Penetration are set to half the models [the models] Strength, respectively Armour Penetration, rounding fractions up. This is done after applying other modifiers.

item.name: Red Haze
item.description: The models Close Combat Attacks gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration, but each of its Close Combat Attacks with a natural to-hit roll of 1 is distributed onto the attacking models Health Pool.

item.name: Rising Star
item.description: Universal Rule. Each time attacks made by the model kill an enemy model in a Duel, the model gains a +1 Combat Score modifier for the rest of the game.

item.name: Roaming Hands
item.description: While the unit is Engaged with an enemy units Flank or Rear Facing, the model gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Segmented Shell
item.description: When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds (X), reduce X by 1, to a minimum of 1.

item.name: Smother
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. If the attack is allocated towards a Large model, it gains +1 to hit and +1 to wound.

item.name: Smothering Coils
item.description: The model gains +1 to-wound with Close Combat Attacks against models with Scoring.

item.name: Sorcerous Antennae
item.description: 0-2 per Army. At the start of Siphon the Veil in each of your Magic Phases, choose a single model part in each unit with one or more instances of this Manifestation. The chosen model part gains Channel (1) until the end of the Magic Phase.

item.name: Spear of Infinity
item.description: The target suffers 1 hit with Strength 2 [5], Armour Penetration 2, Area Attack (1x5), and [Multiple Wounds (2)]. The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Strength for each other non-Attribute Spell successfully cast in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

item.name: Spell Craving
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. The model can perform up to 3 Supporting Attacks. When determining Combat Score, a side with at least one model with Spell Craving Engaged in Combat adds +X to its sides Combat Score, where X is the number of non-Bound non-Attribute Spells known by enemy Wizards in units in base contact with it (note that multiple instances of the same spell count as 1 each).

item.name: Stiff Upper Lip
item.description: Discipline Tests taken by units with at least one model with this Manifestation are subject to Minimised Roll.

item.name: Strixian Spirit
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Fly (6", 18"), Light Troops, +1 Resilience, +1 Health Point, and its Height is changed to Gigantic.

item.name: Talon Scythes
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Attacks made with Talon Scythes ignore Parry and, if allocated towards Standard or Large Infantry, gain a +1 to-hit modifier.

item.name: Third Eye
item.description: Universal Rule. At the beginning of each friendly Charge Phase, draw the Flux Card for that Player Turn instead of step 2 of the Magic Phase Sequence.

item.name: Tightening Grasp
item.description: Special Attack. The model gains Grind Attacks (X), and can make Grind Attacks as Supporting Attacks, ignoring the maximum number of Supporting Attacks. When the model is not Engaged in Combat, X is set to 1. At the start of each Round of Combat other than the First Round of Combat, if the model is Engaged, X is increased by +1 (e.g. Grind Attacks (1) becomes Grind Attacks (2)).

item.name: Unhinging Jaw
item.description: Failed to-wound rolls from Close Combat Attacks against Large or Gigantic models made by the model must be rerolled.

item.name: Unnatural Roots
item.description: A side with one or more models with Unnatural Roots Engaged in Combat at the end of the Round of Combat adds +1 to its Combat Score.

item.name: Veil Stalker
item.description: Universal Rule. The model follows the rules for Ambush with the following exceptions: When the unit arrives, the owner may choose to place it within 6" of an enemy model with Channel (instead of entering the Battlefield from the Board Edge). If so, it cannot perform any Advance Moves this Movement Phase (note that this does not prevent the unit from performing a Reform).

item.name: Venom Sacs
item.description: The model gains Poison Attacks. If the models Close Combat Attacks already were Poison Attacks from another source than this Manifestation, the attack will automatically wound on successful to-hit rolls of 5+ instead of 6+.

item.name: Whipcrack Tail
item.description: The model gains Lightning Reflexes.

item.name: Withering Vapour
item.description: 0-2 per Army. The bearer gains Breath Attack (Str 3, AP 2).

item.name: Writhing Nightmares
item.description: Manifestation. Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with Writhing Nightmares suffer -1 Discipline.

rule.name: Rule#11
rule.leftTerm: Mark of the Eternal Champion (Champion only)
